verses.text: \w Wherefore|strong="G5105"\w* \w seeing|strong="G2192"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* are compassed about \w with|strong="G4029"\w* so \w great|strong="G5118"\w* a \w cloud|strong="G3509"\w* of \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*, let us lay \w aside|strong="G0659"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w weight|strong="G3591"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* which doth so easily \w beset|strong="G2139"\w* \add us\add*, and let us \w run|strong="G5143"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* the \w race|strong="G0073"\w* that is set \w before|strong="G4295"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*,

\w Looking|strong="G0872"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* the \w author|strong="G0747"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w finisher|strong="G5051"\w* \w of|strong="G4102"\w* \add our\add* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*; \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w for|strong="G0473"\w* the \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* that was set \w before|strong="G4295"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w endured|strong="G5278"\w* the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*, \w despising|strong="G2706"\w* the \w shame|strong="G0152"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* is set \w down|strong="G2523"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* of the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w consider|strong="G0357"\w* him that \w endured|strong="G5278"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w contradiction|strong="G0485"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* ye be \w wearied|strong="G2577"\w* and \w faint|strong="G1590"\w* \w in|strong="G5590"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w minds|strong="G5590"\w*.

Ye \w have|strong="G0478"\w* not \w yet|strong="G3768"\w* \w resisted|strong="G0478"\w* \w unto|strong="G3360"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w striving|strong="G0464"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* ye have \w forgotten|strong="G1585"\w* the \w exhortation|strong="G3874"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w speaketh|strong="G1256"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* unto \w children|strong="G5207"\w*, \w My|strong="G3450"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w despise|strong="G3643"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w thou|strong="G3643"\w* the \w chastening|strong="G3809"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* \w faint|strong="G1590"\w* when thou art \w rebuked|strong="G1651"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* he \w chasteneth|strong="G3811"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w scourgeth|strong="G3146"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he \w receiveth|strong="G3858"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w endure|strong="G5278"\w* \w chastening|strong="G3809"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w dealeth|strong="G4374"\w* with \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* with \w sons|strong="G5207"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* is \w he|strong="G2076"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w chasteneth|strong="G3811"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w be|strong="G2075"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w chastisement|strong="G3809"\w*, \w whereof|strong="G3739"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G1096"\w* \w partakers|strong="G3353"\w*, \w then|strong="G0686"\w* are \w ye|strong="G2075"\w* \w bastards|strong="G3541"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w*.

\w Furthermore|strong="G1534"\w* we have \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G4561"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* which \w corrected|strong="G3810"\w* \add us\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* we \w gave|strong="G1788"\w* \add them\add* \w reverence|strong="G1788"\w*: shall \w we|strong="G5293"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* be in subjection \w unto|strong="G5293"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G3811"\w* \w verily|strong="G3303"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* a \w few|strong="G3641"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w chastened|strong="G3811"\w* \add us\add* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* their \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w pleasure|strong="G1380"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \add our\add* \w profit|strong="G4851"\w*, \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \add we\add* might be \w partakers|strong="G3335"\w* \w of|strong="G0041"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w holiness|strong="G0041"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w chastening|strong="G3809"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* the \w present|strong="G3918"\w* \w seemeth|strong="G1380"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w joyous|strong="G5479"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w grievous|strong="G3077"\w*: \w nevertheless|strong="G1161"\w* \w afterward|strong="G5305"\w* it \w yieldeth|strong="G0591"\w* \w the|strong="G2590"\w* \w peaceable|strong="G1516"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* unto them which are \w exercised|strong="G1128"\w* \w there|strong="G0846"\w*\w by|strong="G1223"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* lift \w up|strong="G0461"\w* the \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* which hang \w down|strong="G3935"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1119"\w* \w feeble|strong="G3886"\w* \w knees|strong="G1119"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w straight|strong="G3717"\w* \w paths|strong="G5163"\w* \w for|strong="G4228"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* that which is \w lame|strong="G5560"\w* be turned out of the \w way|strong="G1624"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* let \w it|strong="G2390"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* be \w healed|strong="G2390"\w*.

\w Follow|strong="G1377"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w holiness|strong="G0038"\w*, \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* shall \w see|strong="G3700"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*:

Looking \w diligently|strong="G1983"\w* \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w fail|strong="G5302"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w root|strong="G4491"\w* of \w bitterness|strong="G4088"\w* \w springing|strong="G5453"\w* \w up|strong="G0507"\w* \w trouble|strong="G1776"\w* \add you\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G3778"\w*\w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* be \w defiled|strong="G3392"\w*;

Lest \w there|strong="G3361"\w* \add be\add* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w fornicator|strong="G4205"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* profane \w person|strong="G0952"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w Esau|strong="G2269"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w for|strong="G0473"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* morsel of \w meat|strong="G1035"\w* \w sold|strong="G0591"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w birthright|strong="G4415"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w know|strong="G2467"\w* how \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w afterward|strong="G3347"\w*, when he would \w have|strong="G2309"\w* \w inherited|strong="G2816"\w* the \w blessing|strong="G2129"\w*, he was \w rejected|strong="G0593"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* of \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*, \w though|strong="G2539"\w* he \w sought|strong="G1567"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w carefully|strong="G1567"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w tears|strong="G1144"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w are|strong="G4334"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* come \w unto|strong="G4334"\w* the \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* that might be \w touched|strong="G5584"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that \w burned|strong="G2545"\w* with \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*, \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* unto \w blackness|strong="G1105"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tempest|strong="G2366"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sound|strong="G2279"\w* of a \w trumpet|strong="G4536"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of \w words|strong="G4487"\w*; \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \add voice\add* they that \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w intreated|strong="G3868"\w* \w that|strong="G3361"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w should|strong="G4369"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* be \w spoken|strong="G4369"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w* any more:

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* they \w could|strong="G5342"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w endure|strong="G5342"\w* that which was \w commanded|strong="G1291"\w*, And if so much \w as|strong="G2579"\w* a \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w touch|strong="G2345"\w* the \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w*, it shall be \w stoned|strong="G3036"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* thrust \w through|strong="G2700"\w* with a \w dart|strong="G1002"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w terrible|strong="G5398"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* the \w sight|strong="G5324"\w*, \add that\add* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w I|strong="G1510"\w* exceedingly \w fear|strong="G1630"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w quake|strong="G1790"\w*:)

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* ye are \w come|strong="G4334"\w* unto \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* \w Sion|strong="G4622"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unto the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of \w the|strong="G2316"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w the|strong="G2419"\w* \w heavenly|strong="G2032"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to an innumerable \w company|strong="G3461"\w* of \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*,

To the general \w assembly|strong="G3831"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w* of the \w firstborn|strong="G4416"\w*, which are \w written|strong="G0583"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w Judge|strong="G2923"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* of just \w men|strong="G1342"\w* made \w perfect|strong="G5048"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* to \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* the \w mediator|strong="G3316"\w* of \w the|strong="G1242"\w* \w new|strong="G3501"\w* \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w sprinkling|strong="G4473"\w*, that \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w* better \w things|strong="G2909"\w* \w than|strong="G3844"\w* \add that of\add* \w Abel|strong="G0006"\w*.

\w See|strong="G0991"\w* \w that|strong="G3361"\w* \w ye|strong="G0991"\w* \w refuse|strong="G3868"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* him that \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w they|strong="G1565"\w* \w escaped|strong="G5343"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* who \w refused|strong="G3868"\w* him that \w spake|strong="G5537"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \add shall not\add* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \add escape\add*, if we turn away \w from|strong="G0654"\w* him \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \add speaketh\add* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*:

\w Whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w then|strong="G5119"\w* \w shook|strong="G4531"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* he hath \w promised|strong="G1861"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w once|strong="G0530"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w shake|strong="G4579"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \add word\add*, \w Yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w once|strong="G0530"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w*, \w signifieth|strong="G1213"\w* the \w removing|strong="G3331"\w* of those things that are \w shaken|strong="G4531"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* of things that are \w made|strong="G4160"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* those things \w which|strong="G4531"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3361"\w* be \w shaken|strong="G4531"\w* may \w remain|strong="G3306"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* we \w receiving|strong="G3880"\w* a \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* which cannot be \w moved|strong="G0761"\w*, let us \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w whereby|strong="G1223"\w* we may \w serve|strong="G3000"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w acceptably|strong="G2102"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w reverence|strong="G0127"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* godly \w fear|strong="G2124"\w*:
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add is\add* \w a|strong="G4442"\w* \w consuming|strong="G2654"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*.
